description.value: Thecruelfusion feeds on fear and despair. When you strike a target that is @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.DtwiUWi8dpzkq4tM]{Frightened}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.BVdjvpucmvQU4cc1]{Panicked}, or shaken with a weapon with this fusion, the target is @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.ZacF0l6IwqBwToTJ]{Sickened} for 1 round. When you make a successful attack that drops a foe (either by killing it or knocking it unconscious), you gain 5 temporary Hit Points that last for 10 minutes. Weapons with the nonlethal special property cannot benefit from thecruelfusion.
